Title: Respawn Entertainment & Electronic Arts: Public BETA for Titanfall
Overview:
Letter to: Respawn Entertainment & Electronic Arts

 

Please release a public BETA for Titanfall. As of starting this petition Titanfall is in a limited ALPHA allowing only a select few of your fans help fine-tune Titanfall on the Xbox One. Nobody can deny that Titanfall is the most anticipated game coming to Xbox One and what better way to help make it better than a public BETA. Hopefully this petition gains enough attention in hopes you consider a public BETA release.

 

Titanfall fans
Letter Body: Please release a public BETA for Titanfall. As of starting this petition Titanfall is in a limited ALPHA allowing only a select few of your fans help fine-tune Titanfall on the Xbox One.
